com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl
Class AdjustAttributesMutateOperator

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xevolution.evolution.impl.AbstractEvolutionObject
      com.xtructure.xevolution.operator.impl.AbstractOperator<D>
          com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl.AbstractNEATOperator<GeneMap>
              com.xtructure.xneat.operators.impl.AdjustAttributesMutateOperator
All Implemented Interfaces:
EvolutionObject, MutateOperator<GeneMap>, Operator<GeneMap>
public class AdjustAttributesMutateOperator
extends AbstractNEATOperator<GeneMap>
implements MutateOperator<GeneMap>

AdjustAttributesMutateOperator is a MutateOperator that changes the values of fields in a GeneMap's genes, rather than it's topological configuration.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Constructor Detail

AdjustAttributesMutateOperator

public AdjustAttributesMutateOperator(boolean mutateLink,
                                      boolean mutateNode,
                                      double mutateAttributeProbability,
                                      double mutateGeneProbability,
                                      NEATGeneticsFactory<GeneMap> geneticsFactory)
Creates a new AdjustAttributesMutateOperator. It selects Genes to mutate (link or node gene as indication by the given flags) with the given mutateGeneProbability, but always mutates at least one gene. Selected Genes will have their fields adjusted with the given mutateAttributeProbability, but always adjusting at least one field.

Parameters:
mutateLink - indicates that this MutateOperator should try to mutate links
mutateNode - indicates that this MutateOperator should try to mutate nodes
mutateAttributeProbability - the probability that any attribute in a gene will be adjusted
mutateGeneProbability - the probability that any gene will be selected for mutation
geneticsFactory - the NEATGeneticsFactory used by this AdjustAttributesMutateOperator
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If neither mutateLink or mutateNode are true

AdjustAttributesMutateOperator

public AdjustAttributesMutateOperator(boolean mutateLink,
                                      boolean mutateNode,
                                      XValId<?> fieldId,
                                      NEATGeneticsFactory<GeneMap> geneticsFactory)
Creates a new AdjustAttributesMutateOperator. It mutates all Gene in the given Genome's GeneMap, but only adjusts a single field as specified by the given fieldId.

Parameters:
mutateLink - indicates that this MutateOperator should try to mutate links
mutateNode - indicates that this MutateOperator should try to mutate nodes
fieldId - the XValId of the field whose value is to be adjusted
geneticsFactory - the NEATGeneticsFactory used by this AdjustAttributesMutateOperator
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If neither mutateLink or mutateNode are true
Method Detail

mutate

public NEATGenome<GeneMap> mutate(int idNumber,
                                  Genome<GeneMap> genome)
                           throws Operator.OperationFailedException
Creates a child NEATGenome by selecting Genes in the given Genome's GeneMap and adjusting them using RandomUtil.randomlyAdjustParameterGaussian(double, Range). (Integer type data is converted to double before adjustment.)

Specified by:
mutate in interface MutateOperator<GeneMap>
Parameters:
idNumber - the instance number for the id of the child Genome
genome - the parent Genome
Returns:
the child Genome
Throws:
OperationFailedException - If there are no genes to mutate
Operator.OperationFailedException
See Also:
MutateOperator.mutate(int, com.xtructure.xevolution.genetics.Genome)

mutateLinks

private boolean mutateLinks(java.util.List<LinkGene> links)
Goes through the list of LinkGenes and selects links to mutate.

Parameters:
links - the LinkGenes to (potentially) mutate
Returns:
true if any of the LinkGenes were changed (whether it was selected for mutation or not), false otherwise

mutateNodes

private boolean mutateNodes(java.util.List<NodeGene> nodes)
Goes through the list of NodeGene and selects nodes to mutate.

Parameters:
nodes - the NodeGenes to (potentially) mutate
Returns:
true if any of the NodeGene were changed (whether it was selected for mutation or not), false otherwise

mutateAttributes

private boolean mutateAttributes(Gene gene)
Goes throw FieldMap in the given Gene and selects fields to adjust.

Parameters:
gene - the Gene whose fields are to be adjusted
Returns:
true if any of the XFields were changed (whether it was selected for mutation or not), false otherwise

adjust

private boolean adjust(Gene gene,
                       XId fieldId)
Adjusts the field with the given fieldId in the given gene. Currently, only adjusts boolean and floating point values.

Parameters:
gene - the gene to adjust
fieldId - the id of the field in the gene to adjust
Returns:
true if the field changed, false otherwise
